text: The Darwin Awards is a 2006 American adventure comedy movie. It was directed by Finn Taylor. It is based on the website of the same name. The movie premiered at the Sundance Film Festival in January 2006. == Cast == The cast includes Joseph Fiennes, Winona Ryder, David Arquette, Juliette Lewis, Wilmer Valderrama, Chris Penn, Julianna Margulies, Robin Tunney, Lawrence Ferlinghetti, Brad Hunt, Adam Savage, Jamie Hyneman, and Metallica. == Other websites == * for the "Darwin Awards" * * * Category:2006 adventure movies Category:2006 romantic comedy movies Category:2000s road movies Category:American adventure movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:Movies about death Category:Movies set in San Francisco Category:MGM movies
title: The Darwin Awards (movie)
